abstract.t: This document collects points of discussion surrounding thepre-midcom SPAN deliverable (SPAN = Simple Protocol for AugmentingNATs). As far as possible it is intended to act as a collation pointfor facts surrounding the SPAN deliverable. Where a discussion itemis not black and white it attempts to collate opinion from all anglesas far as the author is able to without bias. It does not drawconclusions of any sort.
